description: Carmegeddon II is a car racing and battling game in which players can win races by finishing the course, destroying all their opponents, or killing all the pedestrians present for the race. The Windows version of Carmegeddon II was released in 1998; the macOS version was released in 1999.

The game contains several TWT files. While most players will never need to open or edit these files, modders often enjoy modifying the data TWT files contain. Most commonly, modders extract, edit, and repackage files stored in DATA.twt . These files, listed below, store many of Carmegeddon II's basic settings:

common_filenames.description: DATA.twt - Contains Carmageddon II's primary settings.
